amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds appropriated in this Act to be used to enforce a SEC rule pursuant to section 1502 of Dodd-Frank relating to "conflict minerals".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in House Report 114-639 to state no funds appropriated in this Act may be used to enforce a SEC rule pursuant to Section 1502 of Dodd-Frank relating to "conflict minerals.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 188 (Roll no. 384).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 188 (Roll no. 384).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Huizenga (MI).
